column10: courtney (troy) johnson and annaleis dick and devon dick; many aunts
column14: relatives and friends. friends may call 5-8 p. m. friday at the egan-ryan funeral home northwest chapel 4661 kenny rd. funeral service will be held 10 a. m. saturday at grace polaris church 8225 worthington-galena rd. westerville
column15: oh 43081. in lieu of flowers friends who wish may contribute in his memory to the zander dick foundation c/o amy 3821 mc. grath dr. dublin
